CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 24, 1945, pg. 13 reads: "Scintillating! - Mrs. Leona Worthington proved Tuesday evening in Beauty Shop Owners' Fashion Review in Schenley High School that she could sparkle with personality, whether in business or evening wear. As the difficult "Miss Jones" in the one-act play, she was sensational, and was equally as pleasing, as you can see for yourself (left photo) in evening wear.  Center: Personality plus was exhibited by Sylvia Yvonne Davis Tuesday night as she modeled her smart riding habit with all the poise of an adult.  She was one of the many petite models who appeared in the Beauty Shop Owner's Review.  Right: Mrs. Pocahontas Crews turned on her glamour too, Tuesday night.  Stunning in every scene, she was positively breath-taking in this evening gown, as you can see for yourself.  All in all these girls showed Pittsburgh what the well dressed woman will wear this year. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Sylvia Yvonne Davis wearing riding costume and holding drum stick, posed in front of painted stone wall backdrop, for Beauty Shop Owners' Fashion Review in Schenley High School
